      Get discovered services for BLE device.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getBTAdapterMacAddr

        java.lang.String getBTAdapterMacAddr()

      • startScan

        void startScan()
        Will receive broadcast BleService.BLE_DEVICE_FOUND if device found.

      • stopScan

        void stopScan()
        Stop BLE scan.

      • adapterEnabled

        boolean adapterEnabled()
        Check if bluetooth adapter is enabled.
        返回:
        enabled

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(java.lang.String address)
        Disconnect BLE device. Will receive BleService.BLE_GATT_DISCONNECTED broadcast if device disconnected.
        参数:
        address - BLE device address.

      • discoverServices

        boolean discoverServices(java.lang.String address)
        Discover BLE services. Will receive BleService.BLE_SERVICE_DISCOVERED broadcast if device service discovered.
        参数:
        address -
        返回:

      • getServices

        java.util.ArrayList<com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattService> getServices(java.lang.String address)
        Get discovered services for BLE device. Call this function after BleService.BLE_SERVICE_DISCOVERED broadcast is received.
        参数:
        address -
        返回:
        List of BleGattService

      • getService

        com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattService getService(java.lang.String address,
                                            java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get discovered service by uuid. Call this function after BleService.BLE_SERVICE_DISCOVERED broadcast is received.
        参数:
        address -
        uuid -
        返回:
        BleGattService

      • requestConnect

        boolean requestConnect(java.lang.String address)
        Request to connect a BLE device by address. Will receive BleService.BLE_GATT_CONNECTED broadcast if device connected.
        参数:
        address -
        返回:
        if request be inserted into queue successfully.

      • requestReadCharacteristic

        boolean requestReadCharacteristic(java.lang.String address,
                                  com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request to read characteristic. Will receive BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_READ broadcast if characteristic read.
        参数:
        address -
        characteristic - Get characteristic from BleGattService
        返回:
        if request be inserted into queue successfully.

      • requestCharacteristicNotification

        boolean requestCharacteristicNotification(java.lang.String address,
                                          com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request characteristic notification. Will receive BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_NOTIFICATION broadcast if notification set OK. When the characteristic's value changed, BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_CHANGED broadcast will be received also.
        参数:
        address -
        characteristic - Get characteristic from BleGattService
        返回:
        if request be inserted into queue successfully.

      • requestStopNotification

        boolean requestStopNotification(java.lang.String address,
                                com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattCharacteristic characteristic)

      • requestIndication

        boolean requestIndication(java.lang.String address,
                          com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request characteristic indication. Will receive BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_INDICATION broadcast if indication set OK. When the characteristic's value changed, BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_CHANGED broadcast will be received also.
        参数:
        address -
        characteristic - Get characteristic from BleGattService
        返回:
        if request be inserted into queue successfully.

      • requestWriteCharacteristic

        boolean requestWriteCharacteristic(java.lang.String address,
                                   com.brtbeacon.sdk.BleGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                   java.lang.String remark)
        Request write characteristic value. Will receive BleService.BLE_CHARACTERISTIC_WRITE broadcast if characteristic value be written.
        参数:
        address -
        characteristic - Get characteristic from BleGattService
        remark - For debug purpose.
        返回:
        if request be inserted into queue successfully.
